appsgate.lig.main.spec
Interface AppsGateSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
Appsgate
public interface AppsGateSpec

AppsGate specification that define all method that a client can remote call to interact with the Appsgate system.

Since:
June 19, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cedric GÃ©rard

                                      org.json.JSONArray spaces)
Return the devices of a list of type presents in the places

Parameters:
typeList - the list of types to look for (if empty, return all objects)
places - the spaces where to find the objects (if empty return all places)
Returns:
a list of objects contained in these spaces
